items.headline: ‘I’m terrified I’ll be homeless when my husband, 76, stops working’: We only have $100K. What happens to people like us?

items.headline: Adobe and these 9 fellow tech stocks are rarely this cheap. Are they great deals or value traps?
items.summary_en: The AI threat has led storied software stocks like Salesforce and Adobe to trade near their cheapest levels in years. Analysts are divided on which names will re-emerge as winners.

items.headline: Elon Musk gets a win in the long-running legal battle over his Tesla pay
